epics.title: User Authentication and Security
epics.summary: Implement secure user authentication and security features
epics.description: Develop a multi-factor authentication system to ensure secure logins. Implement encryption protocols to protect sensitive financial data. Enable features for password recovery and account lockout after multiple failed attempts.

epics.title: Personalized Dashboard
epics.description: Design and build a personalized dashboard that displays available banking products and services based on user profile and eligibility. Ensure the dashboard provides an intuitive and user-friendly interface for easy navigation.

epics.title: Account Requests and Modifications
epics.summary: Implement functionality for account opening requests and modifications
epics.description: Develop workflows to allow customers to submit account opening requests and service modifications with minimal clicks. Ensure the process is streamlined and user-friendly.

epics.title: Real-Time Status Updates
epics.description: Implement a system to provide real-time status updates and email notifications regarding submitted requests. Ensure the updates are timely and accurate.

epics.title: Interaction History
epics.summary: Maintain a comprehensive history of user interactions
epics.description: Develop a feature to maintain a comprehensive history of all user interactions. Ensure the data is secure and easily accessible for the user.

epics.title: Responsive Design
epics.summary: Ensure the portal is responsive across various devices
epics.description: Develop a responsive design for the portal to provide a consistent experience across desktop, tablet, and mobile devices. Ensure compatibility with different screen sizes and resolutions.

epics.title: Save Incomplete Applications
epics.summary: Allow users to save and return to incomplete applications
epics.description: Implement functionality to allow users to save incomplete applications and return to them at a later time. Enable users to upload necessary documentation directly through the interface.

epics.title: Core Banking Integration
epics.summary: Integrate the portal with the bank's core banking system
epics.description: Ensure seamless integration with the bank's existing core banking system. Maintain a separate database for the portal to ensure optimal performance and reliability.

epics.title: Role-Based Access Control
epics.description: Develop and implement role-based access controls to ensure users can only view and access services appropriate to their profile and authorization level.

user_stories.title: Implement Multi-Factor Authentication
user_stories.description: As a user, I want multi-factor authentication, so that my logins are more secure.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Must support SMS, email, and authenticator apps for second-factor authentication.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria:
1. User can set up and use multi-factor authentication.
2. Successful verification of second-factor authentication.
user_stories.test_cases: Given the user has provided valid first-factor credentials, When the system prompts for a second factor, Then the user should be able to authenticate using SMS, email, or authenticator app.

user_stories.title: Implement Data Encryption Protocols
user_stories.description: As a user, I want my financial data to be encrypted, so that it is protected from unauthorized access.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Must use industry-standard encryption protocols like AES-256.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria:
1. Data is encrypted during transfer and storage.
2. Decryption is only possible with valid credentials.
user_stories.test_cases: Given the user accesses their financial data, When the data is transferred or stored, Then it should be encrypted using AES-256 or equivalent protocol.

user_stories.title: Implement Account Lockout Mechanism
user_stories.description: As a user, I want my account to be locked after multiple failed login attempts, so that my account is protected from unauthorized access.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Account should be locked for a configurable duration after a certain number of failed attempts.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria:
1. Account is locked after 5 failed login attempts.
2. User is notified via email of account lockout.
user_stories.test_cases: Given the user has failed to login 5 times, When another login attempt is made, Then the account should be locked, and the user receives an email notification.

user_stories.title: Design User Profile-Based Dashboard
user_stories.description: As a user, I want a personalized dashboard based on my profile, so that I see relevant banking products and services.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Dashboard should dynamically show content based on the user's profile and eligibility.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria:
1. Dashboard displays personalized content.
2. Users see products and services relevant to them.
user_stories.test_cases: Given the user logs in, When the dashboard loads, Then it should display products and services based on the userâ€™s profile.

user_stories.title: Ensure Intuitive Dashboard Interface
user_stories.description: As a user, I want an intuitive dashboard interface, so that I can navigate easily.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: The UI should be user-friendly and straightforward.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria:
1. User feedback indicates ease of navigation.
2. Key functions are easily accessible.
user_stories.test_cases: Given the user is on the dashboard, When navigating through the options, Then the user should find it easy to access important functions.

user_stories.title: Display Banking Products Dynamically
user_stories.description: As a user, I want to see available banking products dynamically displayed on my dashboard, so that I can explore options suited to me.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Products should auto-update based on user data.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria:
1. Products auto-update based on user profile.
2. Relevant offers are shown without page reload.
user_stories.test_cases: Given the user accesses the dashboard, When the system checks the user profile, Then the products displayed should dynamically update based on the latest data.

user_stories.title: Simplify Account Opening Workflow
user_stories.description: As a user, I want to easily submit account opening requests, so that I can open a new account with minimal effort.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Workflow should require a minimal number of clicks.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria:
1. Account opening request submitted in less than 5 clicks.
2. User receives confirmation of request submission.
user_stories.test_cases: Given the user wants to open a new account, When they use the web interface, Then the request should be submitable with minimal clicks and a confirmation should be received.

user_stories.title: Streamline Service Modification Requests
user_stories.description: As a user, I want to easily submit service modifications, so that I can update my existing accounts effortlessly.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Service modifications should be intuitive and efficient.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria:
1. Modifications are easy to request.
2. User feedback indicates satisfaction with the process.
user_stories.test_cases: Given the user needs to update a service, When they navigate the interface, Then the modification process should be straightforward and intuitive.

user_stories.title: User-Friendly Account Service Interface
user_stories.description: As a user, I want a user-friendly interface for account services, so that I can easily make account modifications.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Interface should be clear and user-oriented.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria:
1. Interface is easy to navigate.
2. Users can find the modification options quickly.
user_stories.test_cases: Given the user needs to modify account services, When they use the modification interface, Then they should be able to navigate it easily and find options quickly.
